leve.name: Crystal Meds
leve.description: It would seem our alchemist friend won't be playing with poison again any time soon. They say they're going to devote themselves to helping the infirmary that treated them. To do so, they ask we supply them with crystals from the Source used in making medicine. I pray this means we've heard the end of their failed crazed experiments.
leve.client: Facet of Gathering Deputy Chief, Tatcha
